posts.post_content:
[IMG]https://vintagepaper.store/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/Screen-Shot-2021-06-18-at-10.45.58-AM.png[/IMG]

This is the entire book, of course.  I've only shared the baseball color plate here.  The link below has more pics.

Net54 Price: $1000

Original listing:
[url]https://vintagepaper.store/product/1864-american-boys-book-w-color-baseball-game/[/url]

Hi

Do this version have all 4 of the color plates? The baseball, ice skating, fencing, and gymnastics? sometimes 1 or more are missing

[quote name="mrreality68" post=2114797]Hi

Do this version have all 4 of the color plates? The baseball, ice skating, fencing, and gymnastics? sometimes 1 or more are missing[/QUOTE]

His link shows detailed pictures...

[quote name="Leon" post=2114805]His link shows detailed pictures...[/QUOTE]

Yes it does show pictures. But it shows pictures of only 2 of the 4 "colored" pages and those are what adds interest and value. So I was not sure if that meant they are missing or if they just did not put those pictures posted to be shown. Those pages were often taken out since they were color and highlighted and framed outside the book which makes many of the books missing them
